<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Draft of Stellar Radiance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1823)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #187: The Seventh Arch](/Sources.aspx?ID=192) pg. 81</row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This potion's bottle glows softly with shimmering silver light. Upon drinking this potion, you're surrounded by a nimbus of blazing starlight that lasts for 1 minute. You emanate a field of [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) with a 20-foot radius (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) for another 20 feet, like a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60)). You take a –20 penalty to [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks. Any creature that targets you with an attack or an ability must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save or be [dazzled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) for 1 round. A creature who succeeds at this save is immune to the effect for 24 hours.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
